name: You can't force me to kill
name_original: You can't force me to kill
description:
It's a twin stick shooter where you can't shoot people.

The theme of the gamejam was "out of control".

This game is a non-violent twin stick shooter where you mind control a character to make them steal an emerald. The thing is the character you control wont cross the line, they wont shoot and kill people. You can shoot at walls to scare people away but if you try to shoot at people, your character will be paralyzed and wonder why they tried to shoot someone 😅. If you get the gem you win. if people catch you you lose 😉.

You can play with keyboard and mouse or with a joypad / game controller :)


I make more than game jam projects, here you can check the videos about my other more serious game projects:
